input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Best Choice Products Unlit Pencil Christmas Tree Spruce Style Holiday Decor w Branch Tips'
  - Name='Northlight Medium Snow White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 14 ft.'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6.5' Dunhill White Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Co. Dunhill Fir Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Co. Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 3 ft. Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Hinged Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Unlit Pencil Christmas Tree Spruce Style Holiday Decor w Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While it is an artificial Christmas tree with branch tips, the pencil shape differs significantly from the full-bodied Dunhill Fir, making it less similar in silhouette and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Medium Snow White Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a different tree species (pine vs fir) and emphasizes a snow white appearance; the description indicates a different style and likely different construction from the Dunhill Fir full tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an artificial spruce tree focusing on easy assembly and premium quality, similar in function but a different tree type and likely differing fullness and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 14 ft.
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and tree type with the Dunhill Fir name; larger size but presumably similar construction and features, making it very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6.5' Dunhill White Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Dunhill Fir model, similar size but white fir variant possibly differing in color and minor details; still very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Co. Dunhill Fir Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact match of brand, model, and color to the reference product; fully matches the product features and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Dunhill Fir family, but slim silhouette differs from the full body of the reference tree; similar materials and features likely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Co. Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact match brand and product name indicating the same Dunhill Fir tree, fully relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 3 ft. Battery Operated Warm White LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same tree type but much smaller size and battery lights instead of pre-strung mains-powered lights; similar features but scaled down.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact matching name indicating the same Dunhill Fir artificial tree, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact match in brand and product family indicating the same tree type as reference, fully relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Hinged Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Indicates the same Dunhill Fir tree with hinged branches, matching the key assembly feature described in the reference, highly relevant.
